details: Katerina (45mins) Confidence is a good thing to have in the porno business but when this huge boobed, tattooed girl with 5 piercings walked in I wasn't sure what to think. When she first contacted me a few months ago she was very keen to meet but said she had to wait, I didn't know why. It all became clear when we met and she told me she had just turned 18. I checked her ID to make sure, she wasn't lying despite the fact that she looked in her mid twenties. Her odd, wacky personality didn't go down too well with me, she made me feel a bit uneasy. She did have two impressive things that made up for it though — an awesome pair of natural breasts. I fed her the usual lines and got down to it. She didn't have much of a clue but tried hard to impress, she made some crazy faces that's for sure. Her age and attitude suggested to me that she might have either an angry boyfriend or dad waiting outside. I didn't waste time in fucking her mouth, tits and pussy before making her swallow my load. Might be time to get out of Prague.
